active.description: Determines whether the link should have active styles, false by default
active.description_zh: 确定链接是否应具有活动样式，默认为 false

autoContrast.description: Determines whether button text color with filled variant should depend on background-color. If luminosity of the color prop is less than theme.luminosityThreshold, then theme.white will be used for text color, otherwise theme.black. Overrides theme.autoContrast.
autoContrast.description_zh: 确定具有填充变体的按钮文本颜色是否应取决于 background-color。如果 color 属性的亮度小于 theme.luminosityThreshold，则 theme.white 将用于文本颜色，否则使用 theme.black。覆盖 theme.autoContrast。

childrenOffset.description: Key of theme.spacing or any valid CSS value to set collapsed links padding-left, 'lg' by default
childrenOffset.description_zh: theme.spacing 的键或任何有效的 CSS 值，用于设置折叠链接左填充，默认为 'lg'

color.description: Key of theme.colors of any valid CSS color to control active styles, theme.primaryColor by default
color.description_zh: 任何有效 CSS 颜色的 theme.colors 的键，用于控制活动样式，默认为 theme.primaryColor

defaultOpened.description: Uncontrolled nested items collapse initial state
defaultOpened.description_zh: 不受控制的嵌套项折叠初始状态

description.description: Link description, displayed below the label
description.description_zh: 链接描述，显示在标签下方

disableRightSectionRotation.description: If set, right section will not be rotated when collapse is opened, false by default
disableRightSectionRotation.description_zh: 如果设置，则打开折叠时不会旋转右侧部分，默认为 false

disabled.description: If set, disabled styles will be added to the root element, false by default
disabled.description_zh: 如果设置，禁用的样式将添加到根元素中，默认为 false

leftSection.description: Section displayed on the left side of the label

noWrap.description: If set, label and description will not wrap to the next line, false by default
noWrap.description_zh: 如果设置，则 label 和 description 不会换行到下一行，默认情况下为 false

onClick.description: Called when the link is clicked

rightSection.description: Section displayed on the right side of the label
